summary: A young Glaswegian prostitute in London tries to start a new life.
cast: Kelly Macdonald|James Bolam|Hans Matheson|Ewan Stewart|Andy Serkis|Paul Chahidi|Lindsay Henderson|Lisa Adam|Dimitri Andreas|Andrzej Borkowski|Antoine de Caunes|Claire Driver|Emma Faulkner|Joyce Henderson|Molly Innes|Suzanne Maddock|Nick Stringer|Richard Syms|Jennifer Todd|Shaun Williamson|Marysia Kay
title: Stella Does Tricks
